sentences.sContent: They have shown a ruthless disregard for basic human rights.
sentences.sCn: 他们冷酷地无视基本人权。

remMethod.val: ruth(怜悯) + less(无) → 没有怜悯的 → 无情的， 冷酷的， 残忍的

trans.tranCn: 无情的， 冷酷的， 残忍的
trans.tranOther: so determined to get what you want that you do not care if you have to hurt other people in order to do it
